sentence.Network_en: The Barton family have lived in this village since time immemorial.
sentence.Network_cn: 巴顿家族自古以来就住在这个村里.

sentence.Network_en: From time immemorial there has been the belief that there are good and bad places to be.
sentence.Network_cn: 人生既有顺境，也有逆境，这种观念自古有之。

sentence.Network_en: It has remained virtually unchanged since time immemorial.
sentence.Network_cn: 实际上，自古以来它几乎没有任何改变。

14. Since time immemorial (太古时代), human beings have fought for survival. 五在某些口语中,形容词也跟在被修饰的名词之后,如: 15. On Sunday last (.
an agreement immemorial to be born ., 一个久远的约定将诞生.
you will feel that in those unbrageous places life from immemorial times has been led according to immemorial ways .你会感到，在这些浓萌郁郁的地方，远自太古以来生活就一直按照古老的习俗，绵绵不息地延续到现在。

immemorial city , town , circumvallation and architecture-all of these are the testimony of our cuntry " s civilization and our rare memory .古老的城市，小镇，城楼，建筑，这些中华民族几千年历史的存证，是我们每一个华夏子孙血脉中的记忆，它们让人们产生萦绕不去的怀念。

derivation.yuyuan_name: early 17th cent.: from medieval Latin immemorialis, from in- 'not' + memorialis 'relating to the memory'

entry.def: If you say that something has been happening since time immemorial or from time immemorial, you are emphasizing that it has been happening for many centuries.

example.ex: It has remained virtually unchanged since time immemorial...
example.tran: 实际上,自古以来它几乎没有任何改变。

example.ex: From time immemorial there has been the belief that there are good and bad places to be.
example.tran: 人生既有顺境，也有逆境，这种观念自古有之。

entry.tran: 无法追忆的;远古的;古老的
entry.def: You use immemorial to indicate that something has existed for many centuries.

example.ex: ...a modern version of an immemorial myth.

means.word_mean: 1. long past; beyond the limits of memory or tradition or recorded history;

auth_sentence.content: People have been misbehaving in court since time immemorial.
auth_sentence.res_content: People have been misbehaving in court since time immemorial.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: People have been misbehaving in court since time immemorial.

auth_sentence.content: The moan of doves in immemorial elms.
auth_sentence.res_content: The moan of doves in immemorial elms.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: The moan of doves in immemorial elms.

auth_sentence.content: We've had our religions, customs and traditions since time immemorial.
auth_sentence.res_content: We've had our religions, customs and traditions since time immemorial.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: We've had our religions, customs and traditions since time immemorial.

stems_affixes.word_buile: com共同+memor记忆+able……的→大家该一起记住→值得纪念的
im不+memor记忆+ial……的→不能记得的→远古的
memor记忆+andum东西→帮助记的东西→备忘录

stems_affixes.value_cn: 记忆,记忆力;回忆;存储[器]
stems_affixes.word_buile: memor记忆+y状态,性质→n.记忆,记忆力;回忆;存储[器]
re再+membr=memor记忆+ance表名词→n.记得,记忆
com共同+memor记住+ate表动词→大家一起记住→纪念

stems_affixes.value_cn: 记住;[to]转达问候,代……致意,代……问好
stems_affixes.word_buile: re再+member=memor记忆→再记得→回忆,记忆
